Plot: A buddy comedy about a high school tech-whiz whose prom day abruptly shifts into a wild ride across town, thanks to a down-on-her-luck cop and a jewel thief.
Title: Bad Hair Day
Writer: Matt Eddy (teleplay), Billy Eddy (teleplay), Eric Gardner (teleplay), Steven H. Wilson (teleplay), Eric Gardner (story), Steven H. Wilson (story)
Actors: Laura Marano, Leigh-Allyn Baker, Christian Campbell, Alain Goulem
